message.content:
cs.RO, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.SY. 

The paper discusses the challenges and methods for person-following by autonomous robots, which falls under the field of robotics (cs.RO). The paper also discusses perception and planning methods, which are related to computer vision (cs.CV) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The evaluation of the methods and their performance metrics are related to machine learning (cs.LG) and systems and control (cs.SY).
